Text: Thank you so much! I loved this comic growing up. I still call people I don't like "Larry".

...Itchy, any chance of following up this First Comics feed with a Pacific Comics one? A "Captain Victoru" one would be most welcome, as the final three issues explain the significance of the whole series and how it's related to Kirby's "Fourth World"

ChingaTuu, Sorry, I don't have much in the way of Pacific Comics. What I DO have is some of the series that Eclipse picked up from PC, and those will see daylight during the Eclipse Upload Project to come.

Awesome upload! Badger and Grimjack were the two series I picked up when I first got a job. Great stuff. I still remember the "gut wrenches" line from the Hexbreaker GN. For some reason that stuck in my head.
